entry.title: [MONTREAL][Network Services] - OVHcloud Connect
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 9, 03:00 - 06:00 UTC

Jan 25, 20:23 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 09/03/2023 03:00 UTC
End time : 09/03/2023 06:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers will be impacted depending on the number of ports and POPs used:
- OCC 1 port : About 1 hour traffic cut is expected
- OCC 2 ports : Minor traffic cut is expected (less than an hour).
- OCC 2x POP : No impact expected if BGP sessions has been configured
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy and in order to have a homogeneous park for OVHcloud Connect, our teams will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment in the point of presence of Montreal.
